function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Telecommuting may lead to decreased physical activity and sedentary behavior.","Impact":"Negative impact on physical health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Encourage regular physical activity breaks and create ergonomic workspaces.","Technologies":"Wearable fitness trackers, standing desks, and ergonomic chairs.","People":"Telecommuters, employees.","Owner":"Employers, occupational health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Telecommuting may negatively impact mental health and sleep patterns.","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being and disrupted sleep patterns.","Mitigation":"Promote work-life balance, provide mental health resources and support, encourage regular breaks.","Technologies":"Mental health apps, teletherapy services, mindfulness and meditation apps.","People":"Telecommuters, employees.","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Higher dependence on technology and digital skills for telecommuting.","Impact":"Increased demand for digital literacy and potential technology-related stress.","Mitigation":"Provide technological training and support, establish clear IT and tech support channels.","Technologies":"Online training platforms, digital skills workshops, IT support systems.","People":"Telecommuters, employees.","Owner":"Employers, IT professionals."}]}
